00028 ultimix.gallery.AddItemToGallery = function( ServerData )
00029 {
00030       var         ServerDataObject;
00031       eval( "ServerDataObject=" + ServerData );
00032       
00033       ItemTemplate = jQuery( '.gallery>.gallery_template' ).html();
00034       ItemTemplate = ultimix.string_utilities.PrintRecord( ItemTemplate , ServerDataObject );
00035       
00036       jQuery( '.gallery>.gallery_items' ).append( ItemTemplate );

00050 ultimix_gallery_AfterImageUploadProcessor = function( File , ServerData , ReceivedResponse )
00051 {
00052       try
00053       {
00054             var Progress = new FileProgress( File , this.customSettings.progressTarget );
00055             Progress.setComplete();
00056             Progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( 'complete' ) );
00057             Progress.toggleCancel( false );
00058 
00059             ultimix.gallery.AddItemToGallery( ServerData );
00060       }
00061       catch( ex )
00062       {
00063             this.debug( ex );
00064       }
00065 }

00076 ultimix.gallery.DetachFile = function( GalleryId , FileId )
00077 {
00078       ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( 
00079             ultimix.get_string( 'shure_to_delete_file' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , 
00080             ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , 
00081             function()
00082             {
00083                   var   LoadingId = ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( 
00084                         ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , 
00085                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL
00086                   );
00087                   
00088                   ultimix.DirectController( 
00089                         {
00090                               'package_name' : 'gallery::gallery_controller' , 'meta' : 'meta_gallery_detach_file' , 
00091                               'gallery_id' : GalleryId , 'file_id' : FileId 
00092                         } , 
00093                         function()
00094                         {
00095                               ultimix.std_dialogs.CloseMessageBox( LoadingId );
00096                               jQuery( '#gallery_file_' + FileId ).remove();
00097                         }
00098                   );
00099             } 
00100       );
00101 }
